security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill containing only a SKILL.md markdown file. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or environment variable reads are present. The skill provides AI prompt templates for generating ASCII layouts from PDF data.

content.user_title: Generate ASCII PDF Page Layout Previews
content.value_statement: Users need to visualize PDF page structure before HTML conversion. This skill uses AI to analyze PDF images and extracted text data, then generate readable ASCII representations showing headings, paragraphs, lists, and tables.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes PDF page images to understand visual layout
Processes extracted text data with font and position metadata
Generates structured ASCII representations of page content
Identifies heading hierarchy from font size and styling
Represents lists, tables, and paragraphs visually
Creates summary statistics of page elements
limitations: Does not execute code or modify files directly
Requires Claude AI API calls for generation
Output quality depends on source data completeness
No built-in PDF parsing or image processing

use_cases.title: PDF to HTML conversion workflow
use_cases.description: Generate layout previews as intermediate step for accurate HTML output from PDF source documents.

use_cases.title: Document structure validation
use_cases.description: Verify PDF structure is correctly captured before committing to HTML generation pipeline.

use_cases.title: Document layout documentation
use_cases.description: Create text-based snapshots of PDF layouts for archival and reference purposes.

prompt_templates.title: Basic ASCII Preview
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an ASCII text-based layout preview of this PDF page. Show headings, paragraphs, and lists using box drawing characters.

prompt_templates.title: Full Structure Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this PDF page (image) and extracted text data (JSON). Generate detailed ASCII representation showing font sizes, heading levels, list structures, and include a summary section with element counts.

prompt_templates.title: Complex Layout Handler
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate ASCII preview for this complex PDF page. Represent multi-column layouts, tables, and nested structures. Use appropriate spacing to show actual layout relationships.

prompt_templates.title: Quality-Assured Output
prompt_templates.prompt: Create ASCII layout preview that meets these requirements: under 80 characters per line, box drawing characters for clarity, element type labels, font size annotations, and complete structure summary. Validate all content is represented.

output_examples.input: Generate ASCII layout for a PDF page with heading 'Rights in Real Estate', a section 'Real Property Rights', paragraphs about property characteristics, and a 3-item bullet list.
output: ASCII preview shows page structure with box border
[H1] heading displayed with font size annotation
[Paragraph] blocks with truncated text and continuation markers
Structure summary showing 4 headings, 3 paragraphs, 1 list

best_practices: Provide both PNG image and rich_extraction JSON for best results
Verify output file is readable text before downstream processing
Check that element counts in summary match source data
Include page and chapter metadata for traceability
anti_patterns: Using without source PNG or JSON data
Skipping validation of ASCII output readability
Ignoring element count mismatches in summary
Passing incomplete or corrupted extraction data

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude and Claude Code. It sends multi-modal inputs and prompt templates to generate ASCII layouts.

faq.question: What input files does it need?
faq.answer: Requires 02_page_XX.png (visual reference) and 01_rich_extraction.json (text spans with metadata). Can fall back to text-only if image unavailable.

faq.question: How does it integrate with other skills?
faq.answer: This skill creates 03_page_XX_ascii.txt as input for the ai-html-generate skill. Together with PNG and extraction JSON, it provides complete context.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-only skill with no code execution. Data is processed by Claude AI per standard API usage. No files are written to disk by this skill.

faq.question: Why is my ASCII output incomplete?
faq.answer: Check source rich_extraction.json has all text spans. Verify font sizes are captured. Ensure PNG image quality is sufficient. Downstream HTML generation can verify against visual.

faq.question: How does this compare to direct PDF to HTML tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides human-readable ASCII previews for validation and context. Unlike automated converters, it uses AI to understand layout semantically for more accurate HTML output.
